title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Real-Time Applications with a Modernized Cache (API210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用现代化缓存为实时应用程序提供动力 (API210)
abstract: Caching has evolved beyond key-value lookups. Modern applications demand flexibility and extreme performance. Redis 8 introduces two major innovations: Client-side caching, which solves the “hot keys” problem by storing frequently accessed data near the application and cascading invalidations for scalability under load; and the Redis Query Engine, enabling search across nested JSON and complex data types. Redis 8.4 further reduces JSON memory usage and adds new commands. Combined with Redis Data Integration (RDI), Redis now serves as a high-speed data layer for real-time apps in e-commerce, healthcare, fintech, and AI. iFood is joining this session to share their Redis journey. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 缓存已经超越了键值查找。现代应用程序需要灵活性和极致性能。Redis 8 引入了两项重大创新：客户端缓存，通过在应用程序附近存储频繁访问的数据和级联失效来解决"热键"问题，实现负载下的可扩展性；以及 Redis Query Engine，支持跨嵌套 JSON 和复杂数据类型的搜索。Redis 8.4 进一步减少了 JSON 内存使用并添加了新命令。结合 Redis Data Integration (RDI)，Redis 现在可作为电子商务、医疗保健、金融科技和人工智能实时应用程序的高速数据层。iFood 将加入本次会议分享他们的 Redis 之旅。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Redis 为您呈现。
